Hierarchical Clustering Analysis for multiplex cytokines assay

05 Sep 2018

Hierarchical Clustering has been widely used in analyzing the cluster pattern in multivariable dataset.

In this post, hierarchical clustering is applied to the data generated from cytokines multi-plex assays.
